00016 #ifndef __CCONFIGOPTION_H
00017 #define __CCONFIGOPTION_H
00018 
00019 #include <string>
00020 #include "cownedobject.h"
00021 
00022 NAMESPACE_BEGIN
00023 
00024 
00030 class SIM_API cConfigOption : public cNoncopyableOwnedObject
00031 {
00032   public:
00034     enum Type {
00035       CFG_BOOL,
00036       CFG_INT,
00037       CFG_DOUBLE,
00038       CFG_STRING,
00039       CFG_FILENAME,
00040       CFG_FILENAMES,
00041       CFG_PATH,
00042       CFG_CUSTOM
00043     };
00044 
00045     // note: option name (e.g. "sim-time-limit") is stored in object's name field
00046     bool isPerObject_;         // if true, entries must be in <object-full-path>.config-name format
00047     bool isGlobal_;            // if true, entries may only occur in the [General] section
00048     Type type_;                // option data type
00049     std::string unit_;         // if numeric, its unit ("s") or empty string
00050     std::string defaultValue_; // the default value in string form
00051     std::string description_;  // help text
00052 
00053   public:
00059     cConfigOption(const char *name, bool isPerObject, bool isGlobal, Type type, const char *unit,
00060                const char *defaultValue, const char *description);
00062 
00065     virtual std::string info() const;
00067 
00076     bool isPerObject() const {return isPerObject_;}
00077 
00082     bool isGlobal() const  {return isGlobal_;}
00083 
00087     Type getType() const  {return type_;}
00088 
00092     static const char *getTypeName(Type type);
00093 
00098     const char *getUnit() const  {return unit_.empty() ? NULL : unit_.c_str();}
00099 
00103     const char *getDefaultValue() const  {return defaultValue_.empty() ? NULL : defaultValue_.c_str();}
00104 
00109     const char *getDescription() const  {return description_.c_str();}
00111 };
00112 
00113 NAMESPACE_END

00116 #endif
